graphEngine

Class SCLabeler

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphEngine.SCLabeler

  • abstract class SCLabeler
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Pete Meltzer on 11/07/17.

    Handles all automatic creation of FITS Relationships and Labeling of READY Contexts.

    This class may not be instantiated directly, but should be requested from the Computer class that initializes it correctly.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) boolean debug 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SCLabeler(Computer comp, org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db)
      Used only by extending classes to initialize the class correctly.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void createAllFits()
      Creates FITS1 and FITS2 Relationship between all matching context Nodes and systems that fit according to the s1Query and s2Query properties.
      (package private) void createFitsForTarget(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node target)
      Creates all FITS relationships for a single given Node by matchign against all context systems contained in the same scope(s).
      (package private) void createFitsInScope(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node scope)
      Creates FITS1 and FITS2 Relationship between all matching context Nodes and systems that fit according to the s1Query and s2Query properties in the context within a given scope Node.
      (package private) void labelAllReady()
      Adds Label to all context Nodes that have at least one distinct pair of FITS relationships.
      (package private) void labelReadyInScope(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node scope)
      Adds Label to all context Nodes that have at least one distinct pair of FITS relationships within the given scope.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • debug

        boolean debug

    • Constructor Detail

      • SCLabeler

        SCLabeler(Computer comp,
          org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db)
        Used only by extending classes to initialize the class correctly.
        Parameters:
        comp - Instance of the Computer object
        db - GraphDatabaseService

    • Method Detail

      • createAllFits

        void createAllFits()
        Creates FITS1 and FITS2 Relationship between all matching context Nodes and systems that fit according to the s1Query and s2Query properties. Also adds a property to the FITS Relationship to indicate which scope it is contained in.

      • createFitsForTarget

        void createFitsForTarget(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node target)
        Creates all FITS relationships for a single given Node by matchign against all context systems contained in the same scope(s).
        Parameters:
        target - Node

      • createFitsInScope

        void createFitsInScope(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node scope)
        Creates FITS1 and FITS2 Relationship between all matching context Nodes and systems that fit according to the s1Query and s2Query properties in the context within a given scope Node. Also adds a property to the FITS Relationship to indicate which scope it is contained in.
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope Node in which to add FITS relationships

      • labelAllReady

        void labelAllReady()
        Adds Label to all context Nodes that have at least one distinct pair of FITS relationships.

      • labelReadyInScope

        void labelReadyInScope(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node scope)
        Adds Label to all context Nodes that have at least one distinct pair of FITS relationships within the given scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - scope in which to create the Labels
